column4: you could re-install from live-cd and if you don't format the partition containing /home then it will retain your data
so everything under /home wont disappear. and we should install by set the partition label manually?
the partitioner gives the option to format or not during the install process. You don't have to format to re-install. It should work.
& FoolsRun: o i see,  thankyou verymuch for the suggestions
